text: Ntankeka twararungitse intumwa y’Imana ku bantu yuko bosenga Imana yabo y’ukuri, nugutandukana na Shetani mubi, rero harimwo muribo abo Imana yarongoye, hakaba n’abandi bari mubuzimire bwatsimbataye kuribo, rero ni mugendere kuri iy’Isi hanyuma murabe ivyabaye kuribo mumpera yabo bantu bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri
